display_long_description:
Early Access
This content is in early access and may not be close to a completed product yet. Please set your expectations accordingly. Help the developer by providing constructive detailed feedback so we can all work towards improving this content as it develops.
Thank you!

The TCGXR is not a game, a set of rules or images, but a framework for leting you experince awesome Trading Card Games such as Grand Archive.

For your convenience, images can be easily integrated using REST APIs.

Discord: https://discord.com/invite/8T5EyXQVMN

Check out our website: http://www.unicorn-production.com/tcgxr/

If you have questions, feedback or simply searching for fellow players feel free to join our TCGXR Discord community.

TCGXR is unofficial Fan Content permitted under the Fan Content Policy. Not approved/endorsed by Weebs of the Shore.
Portions of the materials used are property of Weebs of the Shore. ©Weebs of the Shore LLC.
